group_1.narration: I’m seeing the dream about “that day” again…
I already know the importance of making friends.@So please stop showing me that time@when I didn't get close to anyone…
At that time,@I didn’t take an interest in anyone’s lives.@If I didn’t get involved with people,@I could avoid trouble and drama,@or so I thought…
But, I didn’t get along with anyone.@So in everyone’s eyes,@it seems I’m the number one kid@that nobody needs around…

group_1.textRight: Take a good look at your classmates.
These are the fuckers@who are completely fine with you dying.

group_1.textLeft: (I’m scared…I don’t want this…I feel sick…@I don’t have anything to do with this…)
(Everyone who’s all buddy-buddy with each other...@it would be fine if they all just died…!)

group_1.textRight: Sudachi Sawa.
Are you really okay with not making a wish?
Hm?

group_1.textLeft: I don’t want to die this kind of miserable,@wretched death.

group_1.textRight: So that is your wish.
I can grant any desire.@Is that truly okay with you?
Well then, it seems you’ll be the first…
I understand, I will grant that wish for you.
I was a solitary kind of person,@just like you.
Back when we were kids, your teacher used to@harass me, and I would just take it.
So let’s threaten him and get him to regret it all!@...was what I was thinking, but...
I can't help but pity you,@being sold out by your own classmates…
So instead of sacrificing you,@“I’ll help only you.”
But, because it was you@who made me feel this way…you too…

group_1.narration: [textBlack:At that time,]@[textBlack:everyone should just die]@[textBlack:was what I truly felt.]
[textBlack:But, as I thought, that's no good.]@[textBlack:I shouldn’t wish for that.]@[textBlack:I was about to die.]@[textBlack:I only asked for help out of instinct.]
[textBlack:Aah…even now,]@[textBlack:it’s still ringing in my ears...]@[textBlack:weeping...]
―Livia―@Didn't I tell ya so!@Calm down, Sudachi!
―Yozuru―@My apologies.@I believed she could overcome the dream this time.
―Yozuru―@I thought it would be kinder to quietly watch over her.@I’m sorry to say I left her unattended until evening.
―Livia―@Ya don’t really need to apologize, it’s alright.@Can you make us something warm to drink.

group_1.textRight: Yer gonna be alright, yer sins will be cleared!@I’m here for ya, for exactly that reason!
We came to Kamihama,@so that you could purge your sins!
There may be some sacrifices, sure!@But if we all do our best,
you can save more people than you hurt.
You can save enough futures to atone for it!
So don’t worry about a thing…@Yer gonna be alright…!
Even if your sin remains in your past,@that past can still save many…
Are you worried about that girl?

group_1.textLeft: The people she lives with@came and took her home…but I’m still worried…

group_1.textRight: I had a slight suspicion, but…
I might…
…have seen Sudachi before@in a news photo exhibit over 1 year ago…
